Class TravelNearestTask

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Task>

    public class TravelNearestTask
extends TravelTask
    Calculates a path to the nearest position matching certain criteria and walks it.

        public void start()
        Description copied from class: TravelTask
        Calculates a path and checks preconditions for this TravelTask. The Task is immediately canceled when getDestination() == null, or when the PathFinder class has found no path to the given destination.
